# Key-value properties


Metadata composed of key-value pair may be incorporated in Obsidian notes as:

- a [YAML file header](https://help.obsidian.md/Editing+and+formatting/Properties#Property%20format)
- [in-line fields](https://blacksmithgu.github.io/obsidian-dataview/annotation/add-metadata/#inline-fields), as defined by the `dataview` plugin
